summary: The story of what happens after a master thief achieves his last big score, when the F.B.I. Agent who promised he'd capture him, is about to do just that.
cast: Pierce Brosnan|Salma Hayek|Woody Harrelson|Don Cheadle|Naomie Harris|Chris Penn|Troy Garity|Obba Babatundé|Russell Hornsby|Mykelti Williamson|Rex Linn|Robert Curtis Brown|Mark Moses|Michael Bowen|Tony Ledard|Karl Malone|Shaquille O'Neal|Gary Payton|Andrew Fiscella|Gianni Russo|Jeff Garlin|Lisa Thornhill|Kate Walsh|Tom McGowan|Joel McKinnon Miller|Rachael Harris|Shakara Ledard|Audrey Quock|David Reivers|Kamal Marayati|Gillian Vigman|Noémie Lenoir|Omahyra|Oluchi Onweagba|Alan Dale|Kirk B.R. keywords: diamond|one last job|fbi agent|thief|cat and mouse
title: El gran golpe
